Daemos received the welcome message from Zardus.

Daemos:
Thank you, Zardus. And thank you too, Supernova. I must tell you, though, 
that I will show myself in my beast mode.
Hellgate, open lock.

The Hellgate's doorlock opened and Daemos walked out. His body was that of a 
middle-sized red demon, but there was something else...
His spikes, running all over his back to his cranium, were metallic, and his 
legs were covered with circuitry. The claws of his hands were 
disproportionned, seeming to be a lot larger than his body could support.

Daemos:
I am Daemos, first Tripredacus to be reformatted as a techno-organic 
transformer.
